102192.「待たせたのう <pc>よ。\n わしじゃよ。:
Sorry to keep you waiting, <pc>.
It's me.

102195.「気がついたか？ お前さんは大ケガをして\n このグランゼドーラ城に 運び込まれ:
Did you notice? You were brought here to Gran
Zedora Castle with serious injuries.

102196.「グランゼドーラ城！\n そうだ 私は アジトを抜け出して\n 外に 助けを……:
Gran Zedora Castle?! That's right... I left
the hideout, and... needed to get help...
from outside... ugh...

102197.「落ちついて 教えておくれ。\n アジトを抜け出した……と言ったが\n お前さん:
Calm down and speak slowly. You say you left a
hideout... but who are you, anyway?

102198.「私はユーリ……。魔法学の研究者です。\n かつてはグランゼドーラ城で 妻と一緒:
My name is Yuri... and I'm a researcher in the field of magic study. I used to work here with my wife, creating medicine to enhance living
organisms.

102199.「しかし……ある日 紅衣の悪夢団という\n 悪しき組織に その研究成果を狙われ\:
But, one day... a group calling themselves the
Red Nightmares targeted my research and
kidnapped me, my wife, and my children...

102200.「そして 私たちは……紅衣の悪夢団の首領から\n 肉体を強化する薬を作るよう 強:
And then... we were forced by their leader to
create a body strengthening medicine... we
had no choice but to comply.

102201.「紅衣の悪夢団は ダークドレアムという存在を\n 降臨させようと企み その供物を:
The Red Nightmares are fanatics who will stop
at nothing to bring forth a being called
Nokturnus and use us as sacrifices.

102202.「ダークドレアムが降臨してしまったら……\n 世界は 崩壊すると言われています。:
It's said that if Nokturnus is brough forth,
the world will come to an end... I felt I
needed to tell someone about this crisis...

102203.「そこで私は 妻と相談し ひとりでアジトを\n 脱出しました。しかし 追っ手を振:
I discussed it with my wife and then escaped
the hideout alone. However, I got hurt trying
to fight off my pursuers... I'm so pathetic...

102204.「もしかして あなた方は 悪夢団について\n くわしい事情を 知っているのでは…:
Perhaps you know something about that evil
group...? If you do, I have a favor to ask...
Please, take this...

102205.<pc>は ユーリから\n幻炎の灰（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Phantom Flame Ash (Key Item) from Yuri!<me 60>

102206.「その幻炎の灰は 人目から隠された\n 紅衣の悪夢団アジトへの道を開くために……:
The Phantom Flame Ash is a secret key that only the members of the Red Nightmares possess in order to open the way to their hidden
hideout.

102207.「幻炎の灰を使って アジトへ……\n そこには 悪夢団の首領が……\n ダークド:
Using the Phantom Flame Ash, I went to the
hideout and found their leader... so I could
try and stop the return of Nokturnus...

102208.「おい しっかりせんか。\n 気を確かに持つのじゃ！:
Hey, are you all right? Pull yourself
together!

102209.「私を逃がすため 妻は まだアジトに……。\n 悪夢団に協力してきた私が こんな:
My wife is still in that hideout... after
everything I've done for that group, I know
it's selfish of me to ask, but...

102210.「どうか……妻を 助け…て……。\n お願…い……です……\n ………………。:
Please... help... my wife...
I'm... begging you...

102211.「……どうやら 眠ってしまったようじゃ。\n <pc>に 幻炎の灰を託せて\n:
Looks like he fell asleep... he must've been
relieved after he entrusted those ashes to
you.

102212.「しかし その幻炎の灰を どう使えば\n アジトへ行けるか 聞きそびれてしまった:
But, we weren't able to ask him how to use the
ashes to get into the hideout, and we can't
just sit around waiting for him to recover...

102213.「……水晶玉よ 我が問いに答えたまえ。\n あまたに分かれし 運命の糸をたぐりて:
O crystal ball, answer my plea. Pull the many
threads of fate, and show us the path we
must take!

102214.「……レンダーシアの内海に面した灯台じゃ。\n 昼も夜も 決して消えることのない:
A lighthouse facing Lendersia's inland sea...
I see a blue light that glows day and night
and never goes out.

102215.「その蒼き灯火が 真紅に染まっていく……。\n レンダーシアのどこかには 間違い:
Somewhere in Lendersia, that blue light is
turning red... I can surely feel their
presence there.

102216.「……占いで見えたのは ここまで。\n 蒼き炎を探し出し そこで幻炎の灰を使えば:
...and that's all I'm able to see for now.
Find the blue flame and use the Phantom Flame
Ash there. That will show you the way.

102217.「敵の本拠地では 厳しい戦いになる。\n 乗り込む前の準備は おこたらぬようにな:
The battle will be difficult in enemy
territory, so make sure you make necessary
preparations. I'm counting on you!

102218.「まあ……！\n ケガ人に 無理をさせてはいけませんよ。\n どうぞ お引き取り:
Hey...! You shouldn't try to force someone
who's injured to talk. I'm sorry, but I have
to ask you to leave.

102219.「わしは 館へ戻るとしよう。\n 進むべき道に 迷った時は\n また 訪ねてくる:
I'll head back to the house. If you find
yourself lost, please come and see me again.

102220.「……もう一度だけ 聞こう。\n ユーリは どこへ行った？\n 答えろ フルーレ:
I won't ask you again... Where is Yuri?
Answer me right now, Fleuret!

102221.「さて 知りませんね……。\n たとえ 知っていたとしても\n あなたに教えるこ:
I have no idea... and even if I did, I
wouldn't tell you.

102222.「そうか……よかろう。\n ならば 仕方ない。:
I see... well, no matter.
It seems we have no choice, then.

102223.「お前たち夫婦の研究は すでに完成した。\n すなわち……もはや 用済みというわ:
Your research is finished. In other words...
You are of no use to use anymore. Yuri will
not be far behind...

102224.「……なるほど。我らが主の降臨を知ったユーリは\n 外へ 助けを呼びに行ったとい:
I see... It seems Yuri learned about our Lord,
and went to go find some help... Stay there.
I'll deal with you later.

102226.「ようこそ 我らがアジトへ。\n 私が 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドだ。:
I formally welcome you to our hideout. I am
Buzzred, the leader of the Red Nightmares.

102227.「ほう……貴様のことは 知っているぞ。\n 近頃 我々の活動を ことごとく邪魔し:
Heh... I know who you are. You're the rat who
has been interfering with all of our plans.
You've finally shown yourself.

102228.「しかし それも すべて無駄なこと。\n 数多の供物を捧げた今 ダークドレアム様:
But, it matters not. We have made many
sacrifices, which means our Lord's return has
nearly arrived.

102229.「時は来たれり！\n 貴様を 最後の供物として捧げ\n 我らが主を ここに降臨さ:
It is time! Let us offer you as our final
sacrifice, so that our Lord may descend
here and now!

102230.「やめて……！ その薬は 飲まないで！！: No...! Do not use that medicine!

102231.「肉体を強化する この秘薬……\n どこまでのチカラがあるか 私の身体で\n 試:
This potion that strengthens the body... let's
see how powerful it truly is!

102232.「こっ これは……！？\n すさまじいチカラが 身体中に みなぎる！\n すごい:
I... incredible... I feel so much power...
...inside of me... amazing... simply amazing!
Gahahahaha!!

102234.「オオ オオオォッ……！\n コレガ チカラ……サイキョウノ チカラ！\n グオ:
ROAR!!! THIS IS... ULTIMATE POWER!!!
ROAAAARR!!!

102239.「ふたりで 決めたこととはいえ……\n 君をひとり アジトに残して行ったこと\n:
I'm so sorry that I left you here... I should
have never left you alone...

102240.「……私たち キズだらけね。\n でも それも当然の報いだわ。\n こんな化け物:
We're covered in cuts and bruises... but this
is what we deserve. We created this monster...

102241.「ああ。でも これで終わるんだ。\n 僕らの悪夢は ようやく終わったんだ……。:
Yeah... but it's over now. Our nightmare is
finally over...

102243.「我らの見続けた 大いなる夢……。\n 我が主の降臨……果たさねばならぬ！\n:
The great dream we have had for so long...
The coming of our Lord must be fulfilled!
At any cost! At all costs!!

102244.「我が主よ！ 悪夢の暴帝ダークドレアムよ！\n 私は 自らを供物として捧げよう。:
My Lord! Nokturnus, the bringer of nightmares!
I offer myself as a sacrifice! My soul
and my body belong to you!!

102245.「おお 我が主よ……。\n こ…これでも……我が命をもってしても\n まだ 降臨:
Ohhh, my Lord... even with... all of this...
Even with... my life... you still have not
descended upon us...?!

102246.「我らの夢は かなわぬのか……！\n グオォォ……オオオォォッ……！！:
Will our dream not come true....?!
Gaaaaaaa....hhhh....!!

102247.「首領のバズレッドを失い\n これで紅衣の悪夢団は 壊滅するでしょう。\n ダー:
With Buzzred gone, the Red Nightmares will be
destroyed. Nokturnus' resurrection seems to
have finally been stopped.

102248.「……紅衣の悪夢団に連れ去られ\n 強制されて 研究していたとはいえ\n 私たち:
Even though we were taken by them and forced
to do research, we still had made a terrible
mistake...

102249.「直接 手を汚していなくとも 私たちの研究は\n 長年の間 多くの人々の命を危険:
Even indirectly, our research has endangered
and even sacrificed many innocent lives.

102250.「……悪夢団の手から どうか逃げ延びてほしいと\n かすかな希望を託して 船に乗:
One of those victims was a child, whom we let
escape on a boat... with a glimmer of hope
that they may escape the Red Nightmares.

102251.「この罪は……こんな深い罪は……\n 決して 消えることはないでしょう……！:
This sin, this horrible sin... the pain will
never go away...!

102252.「しかし そんな罪深い私たちを\n あなたは キズだらけになりながら\n 必死に:
But as sinful as we were, you still decided to
help us, even putting your life on the line...

102253.「あなたに救われた この命に\n もしも 意味があるとするならば……\n 今度こ:
If my life that you saved is to have any
purpose... it will be to use my research to
help others in need.

102254.「それが……研究者の私たちにできる\n 唯一の 罪滅ぼしだと思うのです。:
I think... that is the only way us researchers
are able to atone.

102255.「すべての過ち すべての罪を背負って\n 私たちが すべきこと できることを探し:
Even with all of our mistakes and all of our
sins... we promise to find what we can and
should do for the better of the world.

102256.「償いきれるはずも ありませんが……\n あなたが生かしてくれた 私たちの命にか:
We can never atone for what I have done... But
we will not break the promise we made to you.
We swear on our lives!

102257.「紅衣の悪夢団の暴走を 止めてくださり\n 本当に ありがとうございました。私た:
We truly can't thank you enough for stopping the Red Nightmares and their schemes. We have a new journey we'll be going on.
Please, take care of yourself.

102258.「よう ひさしぶりだな！\n あんたに 伝えたいことがあってさ。\n どうしても:
Hey, long time no see! Good to see you again.
There's something that I wanted to tell you.

102259.「なあ 覚えてるか？\n 志半ばで死んじまった オレの気持ち。\n あんたに託し:
You remember, don't you? How I felt when I
died... those feelings I entrusted to you...

102260.「かつて オレは レンダーシアのとある村で\n 家族と共に 平和に暮らしていた。:
Back then, I lived in a village within
Lendersia with my family. It was peaceful.
Until those guys in red cloaks came...

102261.「オヤジは そいつらの首領に殺され\n オフクロも 逃げる途中で 負ったケガが元:
Their leader murdered my father, and my mother
did manage to escape, but she eventually
succumbed to her injuries...

102262.「そう！ 忘れもしない あの赤マント！\n 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドこそ\:
That's right! I could never forget that red
cloak! That bastard Buzzred was the one I
swore to myself that I would kill.

102263.「オヤジは ダークドレアムへの供物として狙われ\n 村もろとも 消されちまったっ:
My father was sought out to be a sacrifice to
Nokturnus, and the whole village was
destroyed... It's unforgivable...

102264.「できるなら この手で 仇を討ちたかったが……\n 俺のチカラじゃ かなわなかっ:
I would've avenged him with my own hands...
But I don't think I could have. So, I'm really
glad that you were able to do it.

102265.「ああ……今なら オレの人生にも\n 意味があったんだと思える。\n あんたと出:
Yeah... I can now see that my life had
meaning. By meeting you, you saved my life.

102266.「冥王を倒すだけでなく とうとう\n オレの親の仇まで とってくれやがって……。:
You defeated the Netherlord, and you also
saved my parents... You truly are an
incredible person!

102267.「あんたは これからも オレの身体で\n 悪しき者たちと 戦い続けていくんだろう:
I know that you'll keep fighting evil using
my body, and I'm proud of you for that.

102268.「いろいろと 世話になっちまったな。\n 礼と言ってはなんだが これをもらってく:
You've taken care of quite a bit for me.
To thank you, I want you to have this. I'm
sure you can find a use for it.

102270.「さてと……そろそろ お別れだな。\n もう 心残りは何もない！\n すがすがし:
Well... it's time to say goodbye. I no longer
have any regrets! My heart can finally be put
at ease.

102271.「ありがとな エテーネの村の <pc>。\n あんたは オレの希望であり……\n:
Thank you, <pc> of Ethene Village.
You are my hope... and the hope of all of
Astoltia!

102272.「やあ ひさしぶりだね！\n あんたに 伝えたいことがあってさ。\n どうしても:
Hey, it's been some time! There's something I
wanted to tell you, so I really needed to see
you again.

102273.「ねえ 覚えてるかい？\n 志半ばで死んじまった アタシの気持ち。\n あんたに:
Do you remember? The things I felt when my
life was cut short... I left behind with you
my lasting thoughts...

102274.「かつて アタシは レンダーシアのとある村で\n 家族と共に 平和に暮らしていた:
I used to live peacefully with my family in
a village in Lendersia... until a mysterious
group of red cloaks came to my village.

102275.「父さんは そいつらの首領に殺され\n 母さんも 逃げる途中で 負ったケガが元で:
Their leader killed my father, and my mother
succumbed to her injuries trying to escape
from them...

102276.「そうさ！ 忘れもしない あの赤マント！\n 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドこそ:
That's right, I'd never forget that red cloak!
That no good Buzzred was the one who I
swore that I would kill.

102277.「父さんは ダークドレアムへの供物として狙われ\n 村もろとも 消されちまったっ:
My father was targeted as a sacrifice to
Nokturnus, and the whole village was
destroyed... it was unbearable...

102278.「できれば この手で 仇を討ちたかったけど……\n アタシのチカラじゃ かなわな:
I wanted to avenge him with my own hands, if
possible... but I don't think I could do it.
I am happy you were able to do it in my stead.

102279.「ああ……今なら アタシの人生にも\n 意味があったんだって そう思えるんだ。\:
Yes... I can now see that my life had meaning.
Meeting you saved my life.

102280.「冥王を倒すだけでなく とうとう\n アタシの親の仇まで とってくれちゃって……:
Not only did you defeat the Netherlord, but
you avenged my parents, too...
You truly are an amazing person!

102281.「あんたは これからも アタシの身体で\n 悪しき者たちと 戦い続けていくんだろ:
I know that you'll keep fighting off evil
using my body. I really... I really am proud
of that.

102282.「いろいろと 世話になっちまったね。\n 礼と言ってはなんだが これをもらってよ:
You really have a lot of things to take care
of, don't you? Please take this as my thanks.
I'm sure one day it will be of some use.

102284.「さてと……そろそろ お別れだね。\n もう 心残りは何もない！\n すがすがし:
Well, then... it's about time to say goodbye.
I no longer have any regrets! My heart can
finally breathe a sigh of relief.

102285.「ありがとう エテーネの村の <pc>。\n あんたは アタシの希望であり……\:
Thank you, <pc> of Ethene Village.
You are my hope... and the very hope of
Astoltia itself!

102286.「やあ どうも。ひさしぶり！\n 君に 伝えたいことがあって\n どうしても会い:
Hey there! Long time no see! I had something
I really wanted to tell you, so I came here
to see you.

102287.「君は 覚えてるかな？\n 孤児院で育った僕が 本当の両親を探して\n 旅に出よ:
Do you remember? I grew up in an orphanage,
and just as I was about to go out and try to
find my real parents, they died...

102288.「僕の両親は きっと とんでもないトラブルに\n 巻き込まれ 僕を手放したんだ。:
My parents must've gotten into some trouble or
something, so they had to give me away. That's
why I asked you to help me find 'em.

102289.「顔も声も 覚えていなかったけれど\n あの人たちが 泣いた時……わかったんだ。:
I don't remember how they looked or what they
sounded like, but when they cried... I knew.
Yuri and Fleuret were definitely my parents.

102290.「僕を逃がすため かすかな希望を託して\n 仕方なく 海へ……そうだったんだね。:
So that's what happened... with a glimmer of
hope in their hearts, they let me go, out into
the sea... Mom... Dad... thank you.

102291.「……確かに 悪夢団に協力していた ふたりは\n 償いきれないほどの罪を 犯した:
They probably committed more crimes doing
stuff with that bad group than they could ever
hope to be forgiven for.

102292.「でも 誰が責めても 僕だけはふたりの味方さ。\n 今度こそ 人の役に立つ研究を:
It doesn't matter whose fault it is... I'll
always be on their side. I'm so proud of them
deciding to use their research for good!

102293.「<pc>。僕の願い通り 両親を探しだして\n 悪夢団から救ってくれて ありがと:
Thank you for finding my parents and saving
them from this horrible mess. I really, really
can't thank you enough, <pc>.

102294.「でも 君は 僕の両親だけでなく\n この世界をも 救おうとしているんだね……。:
But you're trying to save the entire world,
not just my parents...

102295.「その夢……陰ながら 応援させてもらうよ。\n 今までの 感謝の気持ちを込めて\:
I'll always have your back, supporting that
dream. I hope you'll accept this small thanks
for all the things you've done for me.

102297.「さあ そろそろ お別れの時間だ。\n さようなら……もうひとりの <pc>。\:
Well, unfortunately it's time to say goodbye.
Goodbye, other <pc>.
I really am glad to have met you.

102298.「これからも 大切な両親と……\n 君という希望が息づく アストルティアの大地を:
I'll keep watchin' over all of Astoltia...
Where you and my dear folks continue to
live on with hope!

102299.「やっほー！ ひっさしぶり～！\n 私ね あなたに 伝えたいことがあって\n ど:
Hey, it's been a while! I really wanted to see
you and tell you something, so... I came here.

102300.「あなたは 覚えてくれてたかな？\n 孤児院で育った私が パパとママを探して\n:
I wonder if you remember? I told you I grew up
in an orphanage and just as I was about to
go and find my parents, they died.

102301.「パパとママは きっと とんでもないトラブルに\n 巻き込まれて 私を手放したは:
Mom and Dad must have gotten into some real
trouble, so they gave me up. That's why I
asked you to find them for me.

102302.「顔も声も 覚えてなかったけど\n あの人たちが 泣いた時……わかったんだ。\n:
I didn't remember what they looked or sounded
like, but when I heard them crying... I knew.
Yuri is my dad, and Fleuret is my mom!

102303.「私を逃がすため かすかな希望を託して\n 仕方なく 海へ……そうだったんだね。:
So that's what happened... with a glimmer of
hope in their hearts, they let me go, out into
the sea... Mom... Dad... thank you.

102304.「確かに パパとママは 悪夢団に協力したりして\n すっごく悪いこと しちゃった:
It is true that they did some awful things,
having to cooperate with that bad group
and all...

102305.「でも 誰が責めたって 私だけはふたりの味方！\n 今度こそ 人の役に立つ研究を:
It doesn't matter whose fault it is... I'll
always be on their side! It's so cool they
decided to use their research for good!

102306.「<pc>。私のお願いを聞いてくれて……\n パパとママを救ってくれて ありがと:
Thank you for doing me this favor and saving
my folks, <pc>... I don't think
I can ever thank you enough.

102307.「でも あなたは 私のパパとママだけじゃなくて\n 世界まるごと 救っちゃうつも:
You're not just gonna save my parents, but the
whole world, right?

102308.「その夢……全力で 応援しちゃう！\n 今までの お礼の気持ちも込めて\n これ:
